```text
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(4.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0). The furnace has an input inventory of iron ore and outputs iron plates.

### Chest at position(4.5, -58.5)
Consists of an iron chest at position (4.5, -58.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- The agent attempts to craft `iron-chest` but fails because it does not have enough `iron-plate`. Ensure that you have enough of all the required ingredients before attempting to craft an item. Smelt iron ore into iron plates using a furnace before crafting iron chests.

## NAMESPACE

### Functions:
None

### Variables:
None
```
